articles.author: Erik Sherman
articles.title: As the coronavirus spreads, these stocks are the most exposed
articles.description: Companies like United and Starbucks have taken the biggest hits so far, but there is plenty of pain to go around.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Trump’s Phase One trade deal with China suffers from coronavirus spread
articles.description: Two weeks ago, the U.S. and China completed a phase-one trade deal amid almost immediate doubts that Beijing’s commodity purchase pledges were achievable. That was before a health crisis gripped the world’s second-largest economy, making it even tougher to se…

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: This surprising sector is beating the S&P 500, and it seems impervious to coronavirus
articles.description: REITs are out-performing the broader market, even during the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: Scientists are racing to develop a coronavirus vaccine, but it could take years to reach the market
articles.description: Scientists across the globe are working to develop a vaccine for the novel coronavirus that originated in Wuhan, China and has infected over 6,000 people globally.
